title: "Sorry We've detected a problem with your Installation. We'll now attempt to repair the files." HELP
body:
"Sorry We've detected a problem with your Installation. We'll now attempt to repair the affected files."

What is this issue and what Is causing this? I have now formatted my PC and then changed from windows 7 to 8.1 and tried to play league. 

This is a step by step on what happens sometimes, but sometimes it doesn't I'm not sure why.

1.  At champion select then league crashes to desktop with a bug splat error
2. You will get the error here on the league client *Included photos*  http://imgur.com/a/UT1OL
3. It'll repair then go back into games.  http://imgur.com/a/4hwWr
4. Remake then report and leavers.
or at num 3 when I try to go back it'll fail and try to repair again and it won't work it'll just keep crashing after champ select then try to repair again. 

I have no Idea what the problem is, I've uninstalled and reinstalled twice now and the error still persists. I've been getting this from ever since I've tried to play league on this computer, I've made tickets and they say It does fit the requirements to play league so no problem there. I have also tried the connections issues KB article and the Game crash Article, both didn't fix the issue. I have all firewalls and anti - viruses disabled like windows defender. I have another user playing league in my house fine so it cant be a connection issue. I have also done the permissions KB article. 


Could this be a case of defective hardware on my computer such as RAM? Would I need to replace my Ram sticks? 

Please can you help me!, I've tried everything and all I want to do Is play league of legends but I can't :( This is really frustrating and has been going on for months now

If you require any more Information or Logs of some sort, Feel free to reply down below!

Thank you!

replies.body: Got the same problem, after updating newest patch. Anyone knows how to fix it already ?
you have a problem in your  hardisk  you should to change them your pc delete file automatically

so there's no miracle fix as of yet? sigh... another "AFK" game on my rep sheet.

if it can help anyone : i played league on the same computer for years, i didn't install any new OS or had any major updates as far as i know. however i do think i have some bad sectors on my HDD. could it be that that is what's causing it?

Hmmmmm let's not jump to defective ram quite yet. It really sounds like your League installation is running into some corrupted files and just can't seem to get repaired successfully. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the reinstall *and* clean uninstall options turned on. Let me know if you still can't get League running after that!
before it said it had detected some corrupted files on the windows 7 lol

Hmmmmm if it's saying that there might be some corrupted files with Windows itself, then that's an entirely different issue altogether. Let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can dig much deeper into your system specs to see what's going on there.
but it said that before, I'm on windows 8.1 now
also I get repair failed? how do i fix that, I gone through every step and ran memtest and it said that I have some memory errors
Done that one twice BROPORO, Does not fix it :(
